class.rdfs:comment: A contact point—for example, a Customer Complaints department.
class.rdfs:label: ContactPoint

schema:areaServed.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
schema:areaServed.rdfs:label: areaServed

schema:availableLanguage.rdfs:comment: A language someone may use with or at the item, service or place. Please use one of the language codes from the [IETF BCP 47 standard](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47). See also [[inLanguage]].
schema:availableLanguage.rdfs:label: availableLanguage

schema:contactOption.rdfs:comment: An option available on this contact point (e.g. a toll-free number or support for hearing-impaired callers).
schema:contactOption.rdfs:label: contactOption

schema:contactType.rdfs:comment: A person or organization can have different contact points, for different purposes. For example, a sales contact point, a PR contact point and so on. This property is used to specify the kind of contact point.
schema:contactType.rdfs:label: contactType

schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:comment: The hours during which this service or contact is available.
schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:label: hoursAvailable

schema:productSupported.rdfs:comment: The product or service this support contact point is related to (such as product support for a particular product line). This can be a specific product or product line (e.g. "iPhone") or a general category of products or services (e.g. "smartphones").
schema:productSupported.rdfs:label: productSupported

schema:serviceArea.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where the service is provided.
schema:serviceArea.rdfs:label: serviceArea
